overview.title: How to Play Cube Stack

Any part of the falling cube that doesn't overlap will be trimmed off.
Continue stacking cubes as high as you can without the stack becoming too small to place on.
Your score is typically based on the height of your successful stack.

sonic-the-hedgehog.introduction: Ready for some speedy fun? Play Sonic the Hedgehog and race through exciting zones, collect golden rings, and stop Dr. Eggman's evil plans today!

overview.title: Sonic the Hedgehog Overview
txt: The Sonic the Hedgehog franchise, a flagship series from Sega, centers around the lightning-fast adventures of Sonic, a blue anthropomorphic hedgehog. His primary mission is to thwart the evil schemes of Dr. Eggman (also known as Robotnik), who constantly seeks world domination through technology and robotic minions.

Emphasizing high-speed platforming, imaginative level design filled with loops and hazards, and a vibrant aesthetic, Sonic games have captivated audiences for decades and remain a significant part of gaming history.

overview.title: Sonic the Hedgehog Game Features
txt: Unmatched Speed: Experience exhilarating velocity as you dash through levels at breakneck speeds.
Iconic Level Design: Traverse memorable zones with distinctive themes, intricate layouts, and gravity-defying elements.
Ring-Based Health System: Collect and maintain rings as your primary defense against enemy attacks.
Signature Spin Attack: Utilize Sonic's spin attack in mid-air to defeat enemies and destroy obstacles.
Challenging Boss Encounters: Test your skills against Dr. Eggman's inventive and formidable machines.
Power-Ups: Discover temporary abilities like invincibility and speed boosts to aid your journey.
Catchy Tunes: Groove to the energetic and unforgettable soundtracks that define the Sonic experience.

overview.title: How to Play Sonic the Hedgehog
txt: Use directional controls to move Sonic left and right.
Press the jump button to leap over gaps and initiate a spin attack in the air.
Gather rings scattered throughout the levels to survive hits from enemies and hazards.
Execute a spin dash (usually down then jump) for a quick burst of speed to overcome obstacles or reach new areas.
Navigate each act to reach the goal post at the end.
In some games, explore secret pathways and unlock bonus stages for extra rewards.

overview.title: Why Sonic the Hedgehog is So Addictive

overview.title: Retro Pong Game Features

overview.title: How to Play Retro Pong
txt: Control your paddle's vertical movement using the designated controls (e.g., up/down arrows, mouse).
The ball will move across the screen; position your paddle to intercept it.
Hit the ball back towards your opponent's side of the screen.
The goal is to make the ball pass your opponent's paddle without them hitting it.
Each time your opponent misses, you score a point.
The first player to reach a predetermined score wins the game.
In single-player mode, try to defeat the computer opponent.

street-wheelie.introduction: Master the art of the wheelie in Street Wheelie! Ride through city streets, customize bikes, and perform epic stunts. Download now for thrilling action!

terradome.introduction: Build and defend your biodome in Terradome! Manage resources, face threats, and ensure your colony's survival in this unique strategy game. Play now!

overview.title: Terradome Overview
txt: Terradome is a unique strategy and survival game set within a vast, self-contained biodome. Players must manage resources, construct defenses, and adapt to unpredictable environmental challenges while facing mysterious threats to ensure the survival of their colony.

Experience a compelling blend of base-building, resource management, and strategic defense. Navigate the delicate balance of an enclosed ecosystem, protecting your inhabitants from internal strife and external dangers in this immersive survival simulation.

overview.title: Terradome Game Features
txt: Strategic Base Building: Design and expand your biodome with various structures for resource production, habitation, and defense.
Complex Resource Management: Oversee a network of interconnected resources (food, water, energy, air) crucial for survival.
Dynamic Environmental Challenges: Adapt to unpredictable weather patterns, ecological shifts, and internal crises within the dome.
Defensive Combat: Research and deploy various defensive measures to protect against mysterious external threats or internal rebellions.
Technology Tree & Research: Unlock advanced structures, tools, and abilities to improve your colony's resilience.
Population Management: Maintain the morale, health, and productivity of your inhabitants.
Unfolding Mystery: Discover the secrets of the Terradome and the origins of the threats you face.

overview.title: How to Play Terradome
txt: Start by establishing your initial biodome infrastructure, focusing on essential resources like food and water.
Expand your dome by constructing new modules and facilities to increase production, accommodate more inhabitants, and enhance defense.
Monitor your resource levels and population's needs constantly, making timely adjustments to avoid shortages or unrest.
Research new technologies to unlock advanced buildings, improved efficiency, and stronger defenses.
Prepare for and respond to various challenges, including environmental disasters, resource depletion, and attacks from outside forces.
Deploy defensive units and structures strategically to repel threats and protect your vital infrastructure.
Make critical decisions that impact the long-term survival and prosperity of your Terradome colony.

overview.title: Why Terradome is So Addictive
txt: The Deep Strategic Layers: Balancing resources, defense, and population offers endless strategic depth.
The Satisfying Progression: Watching your small colony grow into a thriving, self-sufficient biodome.
The Constant Challenge: Unpredictable events and threats keep you engaged and on your toes.
The Sense of Ownership: Building and managing your unique Terradome fosters a strong connection.
The Unfolding Mystery: The desire to uncover the secrets of the dome and its dangers is compelling.
The Rewarding Problem-Solving: Overcoming complex challenges through clever planning.

A 'short' action will break your streak and may end the game.
Focus on rhythm and anticipation to maintain continuous perfect plays.
